title: Redesigning the Company Expense Reimbursement Portal
summary: Reducing expense filing time from 20 minutes to 5 minutes through a strategic redesign of the internal tool.

problemStatement.title: Expense Portal Redesign
problemStatement.currentState: Currently, the Sales/Engineering team uses Legacy Tool Name/Excel to Process Name. The interface was built in Year and was not designed for mobile usage.
problemStatement.problem: Users report that the process is Specific Complaint, e.g., confusing, slow. Data shows that Metric, e.g., 40% of submissions are returned due to errors.
businessImpact: Productivity Loss: Employees spend X hours per month on this administrative task.
Finance Delay: Reimbursements are delayed by X days on average, causing dissatisfaction.

personas.name: Sales Sam
goals: Get reimbursed quickly so I can pay my credit card bill.
Spend as little time as possible on admin work.
Upload receipts while on the go (mobile).
frustrations: The current system logs me out every 5 minutes.
I have to scan receipts, transfer to laptop, then upload.
I don't know which category 'Client Dinner' falls under.

personas.name: Finance Fiona
goals: Process approvals before the monthly cutoff.
frustrations: I spend half my day emailing people to ask for missing details.

matrix.reasoning: High value, but expensive to build. MVP will use manual entry first.
Essential for 'Sales Sam' on the road.
Nice UI, but adds zero business efficiency.
High value for 'Finance Fiona' and easy to code logic.
Quick win, adds delight but not critical.

backlog.story: As a Sales Rep, I want to upload a photo of a receipt from my phone so that I don't have to use a scanner.
acceptanceCriteria: User can select photo from camera roll or take new photo.
If upload fails, show specific error message.

backlog.story: As a Finance Admin, I want to see a warning flag on duplicate expenses so that I don't pay the same receipt twice.
acceptanceCriteria: System checks new entry against last 90 days of entries.
If Date + Amount + Vendor match, display red 'Possible Duplicate' tag.
Block submission unless user provides 'Override Reason'.

backlog.story: As an Employee, I want to save a draft expense report so that I can finish it later if I get interrupted.
acceptanceCriteria: Data persists even if browser tab is closed (local storage).
Drafts appear in 'My Pending Actions' list.
